completions.nl_description: Move objects in positions occupied by X to the left neighboring cell.
Move all non-X colored objects to the nearest X colored object if they are neighbors and change their color to C.
Move all objects of color C vertically upward by one step.
Recolor the color 'X' to the color of its top-left diagonal neighbor in all objects.
Move objects marked with X away, and replace them with neighboring objects, preserving the relative order.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the closest object of color X, if they are neighbors of an object of color X.
Move all objects of color C towards neighboring objects with color X.
Move all objects of color X over its neighboring object of color C.
Move all objects that are not of color X, which are neighbors of an object with color X, to the position of the object with color X.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C.
Move all objects of color C to the top, replacing the cell of the object above them with color C.
Replace X objects with the object to their upper-left, if present.
Rotate objects of size 4 by 90 degrees and recolor them to color C.
Switch the colors of the objects of color C and X.
Replace all color X objects with the color of their neighboring object with the maximum size.
Move objects of color different than X towards the object horizontally and vertically adjacent to them.
Move all objects of color C to the positions of objects of color X, replacing them.
Move all objects of color X down. Replace the cells with color X with the color of the object that was moved down.
Rotate objects of color X 90 degrees clockwise and change their color to that of the neighboring object.
Move all objects that are neighbors of an object with color X towards the nearest X.
Recolor all objects with color C.
Move all objects of color X to the left by one position if possible.
Recolor all the objects of color X to color C
Move all objects of color different than X and shift the column to X color if they are neighbors of it, unless it's already X.
Move all objects of color C one step to the left.
Move all objects of color different than C, toward the object of color C, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color C towards the object of color X if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color C above neighboring objects.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of the neighboring object.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C.
Move all objects of color C one step up, if possible.
Move all objects of color X to the left.
Swap the positions of objects colored X and C.
Move all objects of color C towards an object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Recolor grid cells with a single neighbor, changing objects of color X to C, their neighboring object color, if they become neighbors.
Change the color of objects of color X to the color of neighboring object.
Recolor the objects adjacent to objects of color X into color C.
Move all objects with color not equal to C to the position of the object with color C if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color C one step to the left.
Recolor all objects of color X to the color of their neighboring object.
Move all objects of color X to a different color in the nearest row.
Move all X colored objects to the positions of the nearest C colored objects
Move all objects of color C one step diagonally up-right.
Replace color X with color C and color C with color X in all objects.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) X))
        (apply (update_color C))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) C))
        (apply (update_color X))
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects towards the object of color X if they are neighbors, and update their color to C.
Change all neighbor cells of object X to object C
Move all objects of color C one step up.
Change the color of all X objects to C.
Move all objects with color C to the positions of objects with color X, and replace the latter.
Move all objects with color C to the neighboring position with the same angle they were from, if they are next to another object with the same angle.
Change the color of all objects of color X to the color of their top-left neighbor.
Move all objects with color C one step to the left.
Move all objects with color C, one step up.
Move all objects of color X toward the left-most neighbor recursively.
Move all objects of color C to leftmost empty cell between two objects.
Recolor all objects to color C
Move all objects of color C to the position of a neighboring object of color X.
Move all non-X objects except boundary objects toward the center X if they are neighbors of it.
Replace all objects colored X with the objects of color C adjacent to them in the same row or column.
Move all objects to the positions of objects with color 'C', then change the color of moved objects to 'C'.
Replace all X objects that have both X neighbors and are neighbors of a C object, with C objects.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C
Move all objects of color C towards a neighboring object of color X.
Move all objects of color C to the position of objects of color X, swapping their positions.
Recolor all objects that were originally colored 'X' to 'C'.
Move the objects in the top row to the leftmost column.
Move objects of color X to the rightmost column of their row, replacing the color adjacent to the left.
Move all objects of color C one step to the left, and recolor them to color X.
Move objects of color X one step to the left and recolor them to color C.
Move all the columns of color X cells to the left.
Move all objects in the direction of color C if they are neighbors of it, moving the color C in return.
Move all objects of color X one step left, and then recolor their previous positions to color C.
Move all objects of color C, and replace the object they move to with a C.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C
Recolor all objects of color X to the same color as their neighbor object.
Move all objects of color C towards objects of color X (but not overlapping them), until just one grid step to the edge.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C.
Recolor all objects of color X to color C
Change color of objects to color C if they are initially blue.
Move all objects of size 1 two steps up if they are neighbors of an object of size 4.
Move all objects of color different than X, toward the object of color X, if they are neighbors of it.
Move all objects of color 'X' to the left, if they are at the same size and adjacent to an object of color 'C'.
Move all objects located next to color X, swapping their positions.
Replace all objects of color X with the color of their top neighbor.
Recolor all instances of color 'X' to the color of adjacent objects for which the instances are enclosed.
Recolor all objects of color A to color C
Move all objects to the same position as objects of color X if they are neighbors and below X in the column direction.
Move all objects with color 'C' in the direction of their neighboring object, if the neighboring object is not of color 'X'.
Move all objects of color C to the location of the nearest object of color X.
Recolor all cells which are neighbors of cells with color X, to color C.
Move all the objects of color X one step to the top.
Move all objects with color C to the positions previously occupied by objects with color X.
Move every object with color different than C to the column where a C object appears if they are neighbors.
Move all objects of color C one step towards the left.
Replace objects of color X with color of objects adjacent to them.
Move all objects with color other than X to the right if they are adjacent to any object with color X.
Move all objects of color C to the left on the grid.
Reposition the objects of color X to coincide with the positions of other objects that share the same row, and replace the previous colors.
Replace all objects of color X, which are neighbors of objects of color C, with color C.
Shift all X objects to the left and replace the vacated positions with the color of the left neighbor object.
